game

Class EquationBook

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.EquationBook

  • public class EquationBook
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores all the equations to be loaded into the game. Total time spent: 1 hour.
    Version:
    1.0 May 16, 2014, 2.0 - May 23, 2014 - No changes made., 3.0 - May 30, 2014 - Equations loaded are now dependant on the level of the game, a helper method to load the files is now being used., 4.0 - June 6, 2014 - No changes made., 5.0 - June 12, 2014 - No changes made.
    Author:
    Joshua Yuan

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> equations
      Stores all the possible equations as stored in the POK files.

      Constructor and Description

      • equations

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> equations
        Stores all the possible equations as stored in the POK files.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EquationBook

        public EquationBook(int level)
        Loads all the equations used for the game of the specified level.
        Parameters:
        level - int: Specifies the maximum difficulty of equations that can be stored in this EquationBook.

    • Method Detail

      • loadFile

        private void loadFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        Loads all of the equations stored in input into equations. The try-catch catches an IOException. The if statement checks if the file has a malid header. The for loop iterates through all of the lines stored in the file specified by fileName.
        Parameters:
        fileName - String reference: The name of the file to be read.
        input - BufferedReader reference: The file which contains the equations.
        line - String reference: The line currently being read from the file.
        i - int: Used in the for loop.
        e - IOException reference: Contains info about the IOException, if thrown.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while reading to the file.

      • loadEquations

        private void loadEquations(int level)
        Loads all the equations from the necessary database files to the game.
        Parameters:
        level - int: The maximum difficulty of equations that will be stored in equations.

      • getRandomEquation

        public ChemicalEquation getRandomEquation()
        Accessor method that gets a random equation from the equation ArrayList to be displayed to the user.
        Returns:
        ChemicalEquation: A random equation from the equation ArrayList.
